definitions.text: a substance used as a coating to protect or decorate a surface (especially a mixture of pigment suspended in a liquid); dries to form a hard coating
(basketball) a space (including the foul line) in front of the basket at each end of a basketball court; usually painted a different color from the rest of the court
examples: he hit a jump shot from the top of the key
he dominates play in the paint

definitions.text: makeup consisting of a pink or red powder applied to the cheeks

examples: he painted all day in the garden
He painted a painting of the garden

definitions.text: apply paint to; coat with paint

examples: He painted his mistress many times

definitions.text: apply a liquid to; e.g., paint the gutters with linseed oil
